definitions: An activity involving physical exertion and skill in which an individual or team competes against another or others for entertainment.
An occasion on which people compete in various athletic activities.
Success or pleasure derived from an activity such as hunting or fishing.
A source of amusement or entertainment.
A person who behaves in a good or specified way in response to teasing, defeat, or a similarly trying situation.
Used as a friendly form of address, especially between men who do not know each other.
An animal or plant showing abnormal or striking variation from the parent type, especially in form or colour, as a result of spontaneous mutation.
